price: Isaan adabbii Gooftaa isaanii sodaatan(malee kan biroo obsa dhabaa dha).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
